thread.title: New York Times, Google team up on virtual reality films - San Jose Mercury News
thread.title_full: New York Times, Google team up on virtual reality films - San Jose Mercury News - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: San Jose Mercury News
title: New York Times, Google team up on virtual reality films - San Jose Mercury News
text:
The New York Times is collaborating with Google to launch a virtual reality project that includes a free app to view films on devices like smartphones. The newspaper publisher said Tuesday the NYT VR app that will be available for download in both iOS and Google Play app stores starting Nov. 5. The first virtual-reality film in the project is titled "The Displaced" and follows the experiences of child refugees from south Sudan, eastern Ukraine and Syria.
 San Jose Mercury News.
